description: China Customs Modernization for Trade Facilitation and Equitable Development

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project include two outcomes: Outcome 1: Improvement of the capacity and governance level of China Customs by optimizing the management and operation mechanism of China Customs and realizing more specialized and capable customs management; Outcome 2: Enhancement of the all-around, multi-level, multi-agency, international and multidimensional cooperation network of China Customs for trade facilitation and security by establishing communication and cooperation partnerships with local government with particular attention on under developed region in China; with other countries with particular attention on developing countries; with other ministries and the business sector.
subproject.title: Customs Reform for Development
